maqras.text: Ma'i sapata karaicho kbiyamatara dinara
ma'i arau sapata karaicho atmanindakarai atmara
manuhe bharae neki ye, ami ketiya'o tara asthisamuha ekatraita karaiba noraaraima
kiya noraaraima, ami tara anulira agrabhagasamuhako (pababorako) punarbin'yasta karaibalai saksama
Baram manuhe tara bharaisyate'o papakarma karaibalai bicarae
Si prasna karae, kiyamatara dinato ketiya ahiba
yetiya caku sthira hai yaba
arau candra kiranabihina hai paraiba
arau yetiya surya arau candraka ekatraita karaa ha’ba
se'idina manuhe ka’ba, ‘aji palabalai sthana ka’ta’
Ketiya'o nahaya, kono asrayasthala na'i
Se'idina tha'i ha’ba kerala tomara pratipalakara ocarata
Se'idina manuhaka arahita karaoraa ha’ba si agalai ki pathiya'ichila arau pichata ki thai ahiche
Baram manuhe nije'i nijara bisaye samyaka aragata
yadi'o si nana ajuhata dekhuraaya
Tatataiyakai ahi ayattba karaara babe tumi tomara jibhaka drauta sancalana nakaraiba
Niscaya iyara samraksana arau patha karaoraara dayitba amarae'i
Eteke ami yetiya iyaka patha karao tumi tetiya se'i pathara anusarana karaa
tara pichata iyara barnanara dayitba niscitabharae amarae'i
Ketiya'o nahaya, baram tomaloke prthiraira jiranaka bhala poraa
arau tomaloke akhiraataka arahela karaa
Se'idina kichumana mukhamandala ujjbala ha’ba
sihamta nija pratipalakara prati ca'i thakiba
Arau se'idina kichumana mukhamandala bibarna hai paraiba
sihamte dharana karaiba ye, eta dhbansakarai biparyaya sihamtara oparata apatita ha’ba
Niscaya, yetiya praana kanthagata ha’ba
arau koraa ha’ba, ‘kone taka raksa karaiba’
tetiya tara pratyeya ha’ba ye, e'itorae bidayaksana
Arau bharaira lagata bharai jomta kha'i yaba
Se'idina tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i sakaloke khedi niya ha’ba
Eteke si bisbasa karaa na'i arau chalato adaya karaa na'i
Baram si satya pratyakhyana karaichila arau mukha ghuraa'i laichila
Tara pichata si ahankara karai nija paraiyalara ocaralai ubhati gaichila
durbhoga tomara babe arau durbhoga
akau durbhoga tomara babe arau durbhoga
manuhe bharae neki ye, taka ene'i erai diya ha’ba
si biryara sukrabindu nachilane, yito skhalita haya
tara pichata se'ito ‘alakbata’ parainata haya. Tara pichata allahe taka srsti karae arau suthama karae
Tara pichata te'om tara paraa yora yora hicape nara-narai srsti karae
Tathapi'o se'i srasta mrtaka punarjiraita karaibalai saksama nahayane barau
Kalaprabahata manuhara oparata ene eta samaya aha na'ine yetiya si ullekhayogya ekorae'i nachila
ami manuhaka srsti karaicho misra sukrabindura paraa, ami taka paraiksa karaima, seye ami taka sraranasakti arau drstisakti sampanna bana'icho
Niscaya ami taka patha nirdesa dicho, haya si krtajna ha’ba, nahaya si akrtajna ha’ba
Niscaya ami kaphirasakalara babe prastuta karai raakhicho sikali, galaberai arau lelihana ju'i
Niscaya satkarmasilasakale pana karaiba ene purnapatrara paraa yara misrana ha’ba kaphura
Enekuraa eta nijaraa ya’ra paraa allahara bandasakale pana karaiba, sihamte iyaka nija icchamate prabahita karaiba
(Karana) sihamte mannata purana karae, arau se'i dinatoka bhaya karae yi dinatora akalyana ha’ba subistrta
Sihamte khadyara prati asakti thaka sattbe'o abharagrasta, iyatima arau bandika khadya dana karae
Sihamte kaya, ‘ami kerala allahara santustira uddesye tomalokaka khadya dana karao, ami tomalokara ocarata pratidana nibicarao arau krtajnata'o nibicarao
Niscaya ami amara pratipalakara taraphara paraa eta bhayankara bhitiprada dirasara bhaya posana karao’
Phalata allahe sihamtaka raksa karaiba se'i dinara anistara paraa arau sihamtaka pradana karaiba ujjbalata arau utphullata
Arau sihamtara dhairyara puraskarasbaraupe te'om sihamtaka pradana karaiba udyana arau raecami bastra
Tata sihamte susajjita asanata a'uji bahi thakiba, tata sihamte prakhara garama arau atyadhika sito anubhara nakaraiba
Sihamtara oparata sannihita thakiba udyanara cham arau iyara phalamulara thokabora sihamtara sampurna ayattadhina karaa ha’ba
Arau sihamtaka ghurai ghurai paraibesana karaa ha’ba raupara patrata arau phatikara darae sbaccha pana patrata
raupara subhra phatika patra, sihamte iyara paraimana karaiba sampurna paraimitabharae
Arau tata sihamtaka pana karaoraa ha’ba sukana adara misraita purnapatra-paniya
Jannatara enekuraa eta nijaraa yara nama ha’ba chalachabila
